about.title: About Us
about.desc: Since 2014, specialists of LLC 'HAYRAT UL ABROR' have been successfully supporting business projects in Uzbekistan from idea development to production launch. We help legal entities and individuals implement investment plans and develop business in the country.
about.slogan:
Your light may not reach everyone...
but it will definitely touch those...
who are looking for it...
JUST KEEP SHINING... :)

services.title: Our Services
services.doc_desc: Charter documents, adjustment for long-term loans
services.design_desc: Equipment selection, drawings, project, LPI, PSD, estimates
services.finance_desc: Working with banks, collecting documents, obtaining loans
services.expertise_desc: Positive conclusion from the Center for Comprehensive Expertise
services.personnel_desc: Recruitment, training, staff registration, employment contracts

projects.title: Projects
projects.cable_desc: Copper and aluminum cable of various cross-sections
projects.new_project_desc: Professional assistance in obtaining financing: assessment of opportunities, document preparation (applications, contracts, business plan, reporting, etc.), bank and terms selection, credit line arrangement.
projects.agro_desc: Convection drying, shock freezing, sublimation, tomato paste production plant, legume calibration
projects.ecotourism_desc: Recreation area, hot air balloon and buggies
projects.export: Export/Import of agricultural products and customs clearance services

certificate.title: Documents and Licenses
certificate.description:
Consultation and assistance in document preparation for obtaining positive conclusions from the State Enterprise "Center for Complex Expertise of Projects and Import Contracts" under the Ministry of Economy and Finance of the Republic of Uzbekistan.

We provide comprehensive consulting services to legal entities and individuals interested in project implementation and successful business operations in the Republic of Uzbekistan.

whyus.title: Why Choose Us?
whyus.goal: Our goal is complete client support at all stages: from idea to finished product output.
